content: that your working yarn is on the right side attached to the furthest right stitch on the back needle cut your yarn leaving a 30 cm / 12 tail graft the toe using kitchener stitch 7 @thestitchling right toe note you may find the left- and right-leaning decreases and kitchener stitch videos helpful for this section round 1 knit to the bor round 2 knit 1 ssk knit to three stitches before the bor k2tog knit 1 round 3 knit to the bor round 4 knit 1 ssk knit to three stitches before the first marker k2tog knit 1 sm knit 1 ssk knit to three stitches before the bor k2tog knit 1 repeat rounds 1-4 2 2 2 2 2 2 more times you should have 32 40 48 56 64 72 stitches left on your needles work rounds 3-4 2 2 2 3 3 3 more times you should have 24 32 40 44 52 60 stitches left on your needles repeat round 4 3 4 5 5 6 7 more times you should have 12 16 20 24 28 32 stitches left on your needles note position your needles so that the first 6 8 10 12 14 16 stitches are on one needle and the last 6 8 10 12 14 16 are on the other hold the needles so that your working yarn is on the right side attached to the furthest right stitch on the back needle cut your yarn leaving a 30 cm / 12 tail graft the toe using kitchener stitch left toe note you may find the left- and right-leaning decreases and kitchener stitch videos helpful for this section round 1 knit to the bor round 2 knit ssk knit to three stitches before the bor k2tog knit 1 repeat rounds 1-4 2 2 2 2 2 2 more times you should have 32 40 48 56 64 72 stitches left on your needles work rounds 3-4 2 2 2 3 3 3 more times you should have 24 32 40 44 52 60 stitches left on your needles repeat round 4 3 4 5 5 6 7 more times you should have 12 16 20 24 28 32 stitches left on your needles note position your needles so that the first 6 8 10 12 14 16 stitches are on one needle and the last 6 8 10 12 14 16 are on the other hold the needles so that your working yarn is on the right side attached to the furthest right stitch on the back needle cut your yarn leaving a 30 cm / 12 tail graft the toe using kitchener stitch 8 @thestitchling picking up your forethought heel note you may find the picking
